title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Unveiling the Day-long Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF targeted sites belonging to the terrorist organization Hezbollah in southern Lebanon throughout the day.

Earlier today, Air Force fighter jets attacked a terror infrastructure and a launch site of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the regions of Ithron and Al Adaisa in southern Lebanon.

In addition, IDF forces attacked several launch sites of the terrorist organization Hezbollah throughout the day, including a building from which a missile was fired at the Menara area yesterday (Monday).

Several launches were also detected throughout the day targeting the areas of Shetula, Malkia, Menara, and Har Dov. The IDF attacked the sources of the fire.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3vEfIcB
